text.english: If you are a first-time user, select “Register with your Access Code.”
Select “I Agree” to the terms and conditions of use.
Select account type “Teacher” and enter your access code from the access card in the back of your Teacher’s Book.
Enter your details and choose a password.

Choose your level. Check the title and the cover to make sure it is the correct level that you are using in class. If you are using more than one level, you can add another level later by choosing “Add another level” from your Home screen.
Enter your institution ID code if your administrator gave you one. This code links your class records with your school or institution. If you do not have an institution ID code, click “Skip”.
Enter the name of your first class. You can add more classes later.
Sign-up is complete. Give the Class Code to your students so they can join your class and you can see their work.
